system_design_parameter_def.title: System Design Parameter Schema
system_design_parameter_def.description: Definition of System Design Parameters. (Version 0.1). Fields prefaced with [unused] in the description are placeholders (or informational) and are not actually connected in the GMT.

weather.description: Path, relative or absolute, to a weather file for the district in Modelica format (MOS).

cost_function.description: Cost function to use in topology optimization

optimization_approach.description: Approach to use for topology optimization

time_period.description: Time horizon for topology optimization.This parameter is used only if LCC is used as the cost function.

discount_rate.description: Discount rate for topology optimization. This parameter is used only if LCC is used as the cost function.

convergence_criteria.description: Convergence criteria used to indicate to the optimization algorithm when to stop. This could represent a number of iterations.

photovoltaic_panels.description: Photovoltaic systems (rooftop or ground mount) associated with the district - from scenario optimization

wind_turbines.description: Wind turbines associated with the district - from scenario optimization

combined_heat_and_power_systems.description: Combined heat and power (CHP) systems associated with the district - from scenario optimization

capacitor_banks.description: Capacitor banks associated with the district

power_converters.description: Power converters associated with the district

distribution_lines.description: Distribution lines associated with the district

ac_inductive_loads.description: AC inductive loads associated with the district

dc_loads.description: DC loads associated with the district

battery_banks.description: Battery banks associated with the district

cost_function_definition.title: defaults
cost_function_definition.description: [unused] Possible cost functions for the topology optimization problem

optimization_definition.title: defaults
optimization_definition.description: [unused] Optimization approach for the topology optimization problem

geojson_id.description: The GeoJSON ID as defined in the GeoJSON file. This is used to overwrite the default data for a specific building. This option is not used in the default section.

load_model.description: Type of load model to use for the building.

ets_model.description: Energy transfer station model. One side is connected to the district water loops and the other side is connected to the building water loops.

photovoltaic_panels.description: Photovoltaic systems (rooftop or ground mount) associated with the building - from feature optimization

diesel_generators.description: Diesel generators associated with the building

battery_banks.description: Battery banks associated with the building

connector_def.description: [unused] Parameters associated with the connectors in a district system.

pipe_material.description: [unused] Pipe material (to be used for determining surface roughness)

district_system_def.description: Parameters associated with the district system.

return_configuration.description: [unused] Type of return configuration for the overall district system. MW - not really needed. Just use pipes with supply/return.

connection_configuration.description: [unused] Type of connection of buildings to the loop

ets_indirect_parameters.description: The parameters associated with the indirect energy transfer station.

heat_exchanger_primary_pressure_drop.description: Heat exchanger primary side pressure drop. (Pa)

heat_exchanger_secondary_pressure_drop.description: Heat exchanger secondary side pressure drop. (Pa)

cooling_supply_water_temperature_buildin.description: Chilled water supply temperature building side. (C)

heating_supply_water_temperature_buildin.description: Heating water supply temperature building side. (C)

delta_temp_hw_district.description: Heating water temperature difference on on the district side. (deltaC)

delta_temp_hw_building.description: Design temperature differential on the building side. (deltaC)

delta_temp_chw_building.description: Chilled water temperature difference on the building side. (deltaC)

delta_temp_chw_district.description: Design temperature differential on the district side. (deltaC)

has_liquid_cooling.description: Whether the building has liquid cooling.

thermal_zone_names.description: List of thermal zones in the Spawn / EnergyPlus model.

zone_nom_clg_loads.description: Array of zone nominal cooling loads (values should be <0)

time_series_model_parameters.description: Parameters associated with time series models.

chp_installed.description: True if heating plant is a Combined Heat and Power plant

chp_thermal_following.description: True if CHP is thermal_following (prioritized thermal heat over electricity)

combined_heat_and_power_parameters.description: Combined heat and power (CHP) parameters used by the microgrid model.

diesel_generator_parameters.description: Diesel generator parameters used by the microgrid model.

electrical_grid_parameters.description: Electrical grid parameters used by the microgrid model.

source_rms_voltage.description: Root mean square (RMS) voltage of source (V)

pv_parameters.description: Photovoltaic panel parameters used by the microgrid model.

wind_turbine_parameters.description: Wind turbine parameters used by the microgrid model.

power_curve.description: Power curve given as an array of pairs of value: the first in (m/s) and the second in (W).

cop_heat_pump_cooling.description: COP of heat pump for cooling water production.

pump_flow_rate.description: Design volume flow rate of the ambient loop pump. (m3/s)

pump_design_head.description: Design head pressure of the ambient loop pump. (Pa)

ets_pump_head.description: Design head pressure of the ETS pump. (Pa)

soil_def.description: Soil properties for Ground Heat Exchanger sizing

conductivity.description: The conductivity of the soil, in units of W/m-K.

rho_cp.description: The volumetric heat capacity of the soil, in units of J/m^3-K

undisturbed_temp.description: The undisturbed average soil temperature, in units of degrees Celsius.

ghe_specific_params_def.description: The properties associated with each Ground Heat Exchanger instance

ghe_id.description: Feature ID of GHE from GeoJSON Feature File.

borehole.description: Borehole properties for Ground Heat Exchanger sizing.

buried_depth.description: The depth below the ground surface to the top of the borehole, in meters.

diameter.description: The diameter of the borehole, in meters.

number_of_boreholes.description: Number of boreholes on the site, determined from Thermal Network sizing

length_of_boreholes.description: The length of the borehole (in meters), determined from Thermal Network sizing.

ghe_geometric_params.description: The length and width of the Ground Heat Exchanger determined from the GeoJSON Feature File.

length_of_ghe.description: Horizontal surface length allowed for the ground heat exchanger, in meters.

width_of_ghe.description: Horizontal surface width allowed for the ground heat exchanger, in meters.

outer_diameter.description: The diameter of the outer pipe surface, in meters.

shank_spacing.description: The spacing between the U-tube legs, as referenced from outer surface of the pipes (i.e. not referenced from each pipes respective centerline), in meters.

roughness.description: The surface roughness of the pipe, in meters.

conductivity.description: The conductivity of the pipe material, in W/m-K.

rho_cp.description: The volumetric heat capacity of the pipe material, in J/m^3-K

fluid_def.description: Fluid properties for Ground Heat Exchanger sizing

fluid_name.description: Circulating fluid parameters for ground heat exchanger sizing.

concentration_percent.description: The concentration of circulation fluid in percent, from 0-60.

grout_def.description: Grout properties used for ground heat exchanger sizing.

rho_cp.description: Grout volumetric heat capacity, in J/m^3-K.

max_eft.description: Maximum heat pump entering fluid temperature used for ground heat exchanger sizing, in Celsius.
